RADCURE-3820.Round 2-Turn 1-gap_recruit-recruiter:
1. Radiation Oncologist - Your expertise is strictly limited to radiation therapy planning and dosing for head and neck squamous cell carcinoma, especially in locally advanced cases involving the larynx. - Hierarchy: Radiation Oncologist == Medical Oncologist
2. Surgical Oncologist (Recurrence/Secondary Cancers) - Your expertise is strictly limited to evaluating surgical options for recurrent or secondary malignancies and local-regional management in head and neck cancers. - Hierarchy: Surgical Oncologist == Medical Oncologist
